summary.title: Task1_Hospital_ThreatModel
summary.description: The	system manages patient records, appointments, and	staff access

threats.title: Patient account spoofing
threats.description: Attacker uses stolen patient credentials to log in.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Tampering with request data
threats.description: An attacker modifies appointment or request parameters.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: PHI leak via insecure transmission
threats.description: Patient PHI may be leaked if TLS is not enforced.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: DoS on patient portal
threats.description: Excessive requests make the portal inaccessible.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Staff identity spoofing
threats.description: Attacker logs in as doctor/nurse using compromised credentials.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: EHR record tampering
threats.description: Unauthorized modification of patient diagnosis or prescription.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Staff action repudiation
threats.description: Staff may deny modifying patient records without proper audit logs.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Web app DoS
threats.description: Attackers overwhelm the server, preventing medical operations.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Privilege escalation
threats.description: Low-privilege staff exploit vulnerabilities to access admin features.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Token spoofing
threats.description: Attackers try forging access tokens to gain unauthorized access.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Token tampering
threats.description: Attackers intercept and alter authentication tokens.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Credential leakage
threats.description: Stolen credentials or leaked hashes lead to total compromise.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Authentication DoS
threats.description: Server overload prevents login for all users.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Admin privilege escalation
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: EHR record modification
threats.description: Attackers modify or delete patient health records.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Untraceable changes
threats.description: Lack of audit logs prevents tracking who changed a record.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: PHI data breach
threats.description: Unauthorized access leads to large-scale PHI leakage.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Database DoS
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A
